title: Recapping Black Monday and Previewing Wild-Card Weekend
description:
Cole and Ryan are joined by Kevin Clark and Kaelen Jones to recap the recent firings of NFL head coaches as well as play matchmaker and discuss who should fill some of these head coaching vacancies (2:30). Then Cole, Ryan, and Kaelen preview wild-card weekend and give their predictions for each game (38:36).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
